'''''Vortex of Legends''''' is the [[soundtrack]] album for the [[Dragonspine]] area.

It features a total of 17 tracks composed by [[w:c:mihoyo:Chen Zhiyi|Yu-Peng Chen]] of [[HOYO-MiX]].

The tracklist was announced on March 31, 2021, and the album was later released on April 2.<ref>Bilibili: [https://t.bilibili.com/508208469227117884 {{zh|一起期待龙脊雪山OST的到来吧~！}}]</ref><ref>Twitter: [https://twitter.com/genshinimpact/status/1377833167806025735 OST Release]</ref>
